questionText: When applying to a job,

answers.text: I know how to complete a job application by myself.
I do not know how to complete a job application by myself.

questionText: What types of opportunities are you open to?
When faced with new activities,

answers.text: I struggle since it's not what I'm used to.
I am excited to try new things.

questionText: When I have to travel a distance I can't walk

answers.text: I can get there independently (drive, Uber, etc.)
I need assistance with transportation from someone else

questionText: What are you diagnosed with? Select all that apply.
Are you willing and able to answer questions verbally on your own?
Are you filling this application out yourself?

answers.text: I'm filling this out with the help of my communication regulation partner.

questionText: Work Preferences: Preparing for Success
subtext:
There are many types of tasks and work environments that accomodate different needs. The more flexible you are the more jobs you may find, but it's important to stay true to what your capabilities are!

Answering the following questions truthfully will help us find you a meaningful job that you'll be willing and able to do well in.

questionText: I can be avaliable to work during...

answers.subtext: "I am willing and able to take a job if it requires me to work early morning shifts."
"I am willing and able to take a job if it requires me to work standard business hours."
"I am willing and able to take a job if it requires me to work late night work shifts."
"I am willing and able to take a job if it requires me to work weekend shifts."

questionText: I am NOT open to working in...

answers.subtext: "I am not willing and able to take a job if it will require me to work in environments with loud noises."
"I am not willing and able to take a job if it will require me to work in environments with bright or blinking lights."
"I am not willing and able to take a job if it will require me to work near or with food."
"I am not willing and able to work in a uniform that may include head gear (hard hat, hair net, etc.)."

questionText: I can be succesful at a job that is...

answers.subtext: "I am willing and able to take a job if it requires me to work inside an office."
"I am willing and able to take a job if it requires me to work outside for any portion."

questionText: I am willing and able to complete tasks that require...

answers.subtext: "I am willing and able to take a job if it requires me to work on a computer."
"I am willing and able to take a job if it requires me to frequently communicate information."
"I am willing and able to take a job if it requires driving a vehicle."
"I am willing and able to take a job if it requires me to stand for long periods of time."
"I am willing and able to take a job if it requires me to lift heavy objects."
"I am willing and able to take a job if it requires me to work with animals."

questionText: I can do well in situations where I must...

answers.text: Work on Many Tasks at Once
answers.subtext: "I am willing and able to take a job if it requires me to work on many tasks at once."
"I am willing and able to take a job if it requires me to work on tasks quickly."
"I am willing and able to take a job even if people can't answer my questions for long periods of time."
"I am willing and able to take a job where others make suggestions about my work without asking me for advice."

questionText: I can work well...

answers.subtext: "I am willing and able to take a job if it requires me to work on a team of people to accomplish tasks."
"I am willing and able to take a job if it requires me to work alone to accomplish tasks."

questionText: Finding Your Match: Gathering the Basics
subtext: So far, you've been asked about your preferences. For now, feel free to take a break, save your progress, and come back tomorrow. Or, keep going! In the next section we will ask questions about your basic information and experience. It is important to answer truthfully so that we can match you up with the employers who will be right for you.

questionText: Are you legally authorized to work in the United States?
Will you now or in the future require sponsorship for employment visa status (e.g. H-1B visa)?
What is the highest degree of education you've completed (or are currently pursuing)?
Are you or were you part of a vocational/work training program?
How many years of work experience do you have?
What is the best number to reach you at?
What is your ZIP code?
Thanks for your time!
subtext: Mentra is  generating you a custom profile based on your experience and preferences to help and find you the perfect job. :)
